abstract: Under scrutiny after several suicides at its factories in China, Foxconn Technology, a supplier to Apple, Dell and Hewlett-Packard, has decided to stop operating dormitories for workers.
snippet: Under scrutiny after several suicides at its factories in China, Foxconn Technology, a supplier to Apple, Dell and Hewlett-Packard, has decided to stop operating dormitories for workers.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI  Under intense scrutiny after several suicides at its factories in southern China this year, Foxconn Technology, a major supplier to Apple, Dell and Hewlett-Packard, has decided to stop operating its own dormitories for workers.

headline.main: A Chinese Factory Outsources Worker Dorms
headline.print_headline: A Chinese Factory Outsources Worker Dorms
